description: Try our easy to follow Easy Seafood Paella recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Easy Seafood Paella Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1l campbells real chicken liquid stock salt reduced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half the oil in a 24cm (base) paella or deep frying pan over medium-high heat. Add chicken and cook 3-4 minutes until light golden. Remove to a plate. Add remaining oil with the onion, garlic, paprika and chorizo, cook until soft.

Add rice, tomatoes and 2 1/2 cups of the stock. Stir, then spread the rice evenly over the base of the pan and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium-low heat, simmer, uncovered without stirring for 10-15 minutes until almost all liquid is absorbed.
Stir in the chicken, prawns, capsicum, cabbage and remaining stock. Cover and cook 5-10 minutes until prawns are opaque.
Season with pepper. Serve with lemon wedges.
